name: Email
description: The Email object describes the email metadata such as sender, recipients, and direction.

direction_id.name: Direction
direction_id.description:
The direction of the email relative to the scanning host or organization.

Email scanned at an internet gateway might be characterized as inbound to the organization (from the internet) or outbound from the organization (to the internet). Email scanned at a workstation might be characterized as inbound to or outbound from the workstation.

size.description: The size in bytes of the email, including attachments.
